Name: Stunt Will - Fragment
Description: Collect a certain number of these shards to exchange for a complete Stunt Will. Arcane Will is the core material for crafting "Ultimate" type Battle Imagines.
Description$english: Collect a certain number of these shards to exchange for a complete Stunt Will. Arcane Will is the core material for crafting "Ultimate" type Battle Imagines.
Description2$english: Battle Imagine is the crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram combined, possessing supernatural powers.
